headline: Why Analysts See Allegro.eu’s Story Shifting After Upgrade And Execution Gains
summary: Allegro.eu's fair value estimate has nudged down to PLN 40.40 from PLN 40.54, even as the discount rate has eased slightly to 10.03% from 10.05% and the revenue growth assumption has been trimmed only fractionally to 12.15% from 12.16%. This subtle recalibration reflects a more balanced view emerging from the latest broker commentary, where improving execution supports a higher price target but also highlights limited upside from current levels. Stay tuned to see how you can track these...
